A daily dose 600 mg ( 2 * 300 mg ) rifampin administer Day 5 Day 12 . Following JNJ-42847922 dosing , serial blood sample collect 48 hour evaluation plasma concentration JNJ-42847922 metabolite . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
